title: Who are the best writers on Quora in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ve been quite active on Quora for 2 years now and read a lot of readers here. To be honest, some writes only relevant answers with solid rationale by their soul & heart while on the other hand, some writes only irrelevant answers which doesn’t provide any value to the readers here. I believe this simply violates the policies of Quora. It is now being treated as a photo sharing platform just to earn views & ‘virtual’ followers. As you have asked about the best writers on Quora only in 2020, I think these reputed & respected writers mentioned below are ‘evergreen’. They are adding values every year to the entire Quora community by their answers. I love reading their answers based on their rich experiences from all the spheres of life. Some maestros which I would like to mention here are: Awdhesh Singh (अवधेश सिंह) SirRajan Singh SirAmitabha Tripathi SirBalaji Viswanathan (பாலாஜி விஸ்வநாதன்) SirGopalkrishna Vishwanath SirHector Quintanilla SirKalpit VeerwalSaranya Ravichandran Ma’amI would urge other readers to read their answers & you will gain some great knowledge from all fields in life.
